step1Heading: Welcome to the Greeting Card Creator
step1: The Greeting Card Creator has three sections, the first of which is optional.
step2: In the first section, you can add the recipient's name and write a short message.
step3: Remember, you can always check your progress at any time!
step4: The second section concerns the background and special effects, where you can add fireworks and more!
step5: The last section is the greetings section, where you can add various elements and showcase your creativity!
step6: When you're finished, you can generate the card along with a link and QR code to it.
